alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:50AM EST until further notice by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Michigan... Looking Glass River Near Eagle affecting Clinton County. .Heavy rain will fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers will increase quickly and reach critical levels. For the Sycamore Creek...including Holt...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maple River...including Maple Rapids...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River at Maple Rapids. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of County Line Road and a home along County Line Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 9.5 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.5 feet on 01/02/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1200 PM EST.
